Welcome to this hands-on learning repository for **Develop Generative AI Application and AI Agent with Semantic Kernel**!  
This collection of exercises is designed to help you **create your own Generative AI application AI Agents** step by step â€” from **beginner** to **intermediate** level.

---

## ðŸŽ¯ Goal of This Repository

This repository aims to help learners **build practical skills with Azure AI Foundry, Azure OpenAI Service, Azure AI Search and Semantic Kernel** through guided, real-world exercises.

By completing the exercises, you will learn to:

- Understand the fundamentals of Azure AI Foundry, Azure OpenAI Service, Azure AI Search and Semantic Kernel
- Select appropriate AI models and tools for different use cases
- Design and implement Generative AI applications and AI Agents using Azure AI Foundry
- Integrate AI Agents with external data sources and services
- Implementing RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) techniques for enhanced AI capabilities in Semantic Kernel and Azure AI Foundry
- Test, deploy, and monitor your AI applications effectively

## Project structure

/exercises
    /[1_topic_name]
        /images
           - screenshot_1.png
           - screenshot_2.png
        /[topic_name].md
    /[2_topic_name]
        /images
        /[topic_name].md
    ...

## Exercise format

```
# [Exercise Title]

## Objective
- objective 1
- objective 2

## Instructions

### 1. [Step 1]

1. sub-step 1
2. sub-step 2
    ![image description](./images/screenshot_1.png)

### 2. [Step 2]
1. sub-step 1
    ![image description](./images/screenshot_2.png) 
2. sub-step 2
3. sub-step 3

```

## Exercise guideline

1. if a step requires the screenshot or visual aid, use the image markdown as example and put the image description accordingly in the markdown text.
2. output in thai, don't translate proper nouns. For example, "Semantic Kernel", "RAG", "Database", "Azure AI Foundry", etc.
3. keep the considered tech jargon word in english.
